sources.title: Man At Large (1941)
sources.description: Man at Large Marjorie Weaver, George Reeves, Richard Derr, Milton Parsons 1941 20th Century Fox

metadata.Plot: G-Man Bob Grayson, working hand in hand with a British Intelligence agent, poses as an escaped Nazi agent to uncover an espionage plot. Reporter Dallas Dayle mistakes Grayson for a Nazi sympathizer and manages to mess up the works before she learns the truth. She and Grayson then join forces to save the agent.
metadata.Actors: Marjorie Weaver, George Reeves, Richard Derr
